text:
"Aur bhai Adesh Shukla?" (aapki gadar bhari aawaz m)
I still get thrilled by the image, when the whole drama crew of hall-2 was heading towards L-7 and I was proudly following them. Then, it happens.. our play, and we were left awestruck. Alag hi chapte ho shukla sir aap to. Phir chahe apko tark ki practice k liye bulwa len ya kuch bhi karwa len galaxy m..
Baaki insan to aap chamatkar ho.. coordi ban k chhati chaudi krwa diye aap.. drams trophy hall-2 aane ki alag khushi..
IAS Yass baniye ab.. (Ans, I too believe Saifi was better.. haha)
All the best!
author: Shubham  Raj

text:
Dear Aniket,
Diwali wali mithaiyan bachi hain, senator sahab? Khair apne haq ki thi vo.. 
Working along with you people in the HAB was the most important part of my life at IIT-K. Baaki aap to senate bhi sambhalne chale gaye. 
I will miss the simplicity and the genuine vibe in you. 
Diary likhta reh.. aur tu katai chapu banda hai(Gym jaya kar sale).. 
bas faltu ki meeting krte reh gye.. thodi bahut party warty bachi hui hai.. jab bhi mile krte hain
author: Shubham  Raj

text:
Oye Nareda! Bc apan ne bhut chill nahi kara saath m (kyonki aadhe time GH m hote the tm). Kabhi chalunga tere sath trip par.. Tum aur rochak nahi chal rhe the isiliye bhi maine shail lodu wali trip cancel mar di thi
You are probably the sweetest, most approachable guy I met on campus. 
Kaksha m bekhauf mobile chalane ka hunar, onine exam m khali paper submit krne ka zazba.. Haaye. Inspiring.
Always, Mechbros. Bas khus reh, muskurata reh, chill mark bas 4 din kat jane hain maze m
author: Shubham  Raj

text:
Aur be incompetent insan! (Bas itna hi likh k chhod dun??)
Khair.. You were the person(whom I nourished to become a competent president) with whom I had one of the greatest memories at IIT-K. Tere bina HAB nahi chalti.. apan itni diplomatic bakchodiyan nahi krte.
Kafi chatur, chapal, straight-forward aur thode fattu insan. I will miss it the most. Everything. Galaxy se lek diwali.. inayat ka poster.. Mess ki rajniti.. sab.
Regards and respect,
Asli President
author: Shubham  Raj

text:
Kya re sale, bho-shree wale mukesh bhaiya!
Ye katai sweet, innocent sa insan hai.. Lohanipur m langda school k pas gundai krne ka prayas krta hai aur w(g)and tudwa leta hai. 
But, one of the sweetest, hard-working lekin BT padwane k mahir insan.. Majak udana seekh rha hai abhi.. Aapko lagega rudely argue kr rha hai, lekin aise hi mukesh ji apna pyar dikhate hain..
Khud jhagad lega jab comeback nahi sujhega, phir khud baat krne aa jaega.. 
Sexy and sweet!
author: Shubham  Raj

text:
Aur be fattu insan! Yhan p bhi gharwale hain tere?? Delete to nahi krwa dega agar mai kuch apshabd likh dun!
Btw, galaxy ki jaan the sir aap. Chapu bc.. summers m jo course kisi ko nhi mil rhe the.. vo dono course le k baitha tha.. lekin pure summer nukkad hi krta rha bc.
Tere se consistently hard-work krna seekhna chahiye sbko. Simply extraordinary. Lekin aa..chus ostwal, TA202 m grades ache aaye kyunki maine man se mehnat ki thi leth machine pr aur viva sambhal liya tha..
Lekin galaxy tere bina nahi hoti achhe se.. gandigona kr k lastly chap hi diye tm. 
Trip ka kya hai.. Sahil khan p chhodoge to plan khudega hi.. 
Milte rhenge coordi! Proud of u.
author: Shubham  Raj

text:
Aee raja raja raja.. kareja m samaja. 
Alag hi tashan thoda sa.. thoda ulul julul passion photography ka, art ka.. aur pyara insan. 
Badhiya bana lete ho rajababu tum painting wagairah.. Lekin galaxy m kabhi aapko dekhe nahi.. Kala ka pradarshan karna chahiye tha.. 
Lekin sahi hai.. tab raja babu kisi rani k liye gift plan kar rhe honge.. kahin trip pr ja rhe honge.. 
"Are Shubham bhai, kya bataye tmko!" 
Caring ziddi aashique type insan.. humesha teen char reservation ticket sath m.. alag hi chaud.. lekin pipe bas ek hi rakhna hai.. udega hi be phir. 
Khelte kudte kat hi gya bhai 4 saal.. abhi tere se puri kahani sun ni hai.. hope abhi bhi sab acha chal rha hoga..
Padhariye kabhi Patna.. sheher ka dhuan dhuan krte hain phir... 
Tab tak k liye.. Stay the way you are.. Passionate and loving.
Take care!
author: Shubham  Raj

text:
Apne chodu bhaiyon m se bas hum dono ne yearbook banayi.. tragedy dekh rha hai.
Hence, proved apan dono sbse jyada bakchod the. 
I will always miss ki last time college nahi aaya na hi trip pr gaya tha, tere se dhang se mil nhi paaya..
Ab sale tum noida m rhoge yaghyesh ji k sath.. Maze m rhna.. Canteen ki jagah CCD jana.. Sorry bitch!
Recursion seekh le lodu, baki krte rhenge startup.
Stay in touch!
author: Shubham  Raj

text:
विश्व का सबसे कर्मठ और सर्वगुण सम्पन्न DoPA! 
खैर..
"Canteen chalega?"
से
"Jaag rha hai?" we kept our mutual curiosity in art alive.
#artpoरn #leah_kab_aaegi_wapas
author: Shubham  Raj

text:
Wanted to keep it very short and subtle.. पर जो चीज़ें अब दोहरा नहीं पाएंगे, वो लिख देने में ही समझदारी होगी 
(While I am writing it, Eric Clapton plays in the background)
मुकेश से मिलने B-Top पहुंचे हम, भूले बिसरे तुम्हारे रूम चले गए और भाई साहब हो गयी मुलाक़ात.. विशुद्ध हरामी शक़ल, कुटिल मुस्कान जो तुम्हारे braces में घुल के और भी kinky मालूम हो रही थी. उस दिन एक mutual interest ने जो मित्रता का बीज बोया, उस कला की आज भी हम उतनी ही क़द्र करते हैं. पहली मुलाक़ात वाली शाम, देवी उमा जोली की प्यारी आँखें, irodov का कोई सवाल, तुम्हारी फिजिक्स में दिलचस्पी, सिनेमा और शायद संगीत- यही तब भी चर्चा के विषय थे और आज भी बातें यहीं से शुरू होके अंत में जिंदगी पर आके ख़तम होती हैं. 
ख़ैर, फर्स्ट ईयर में कटवा के तुम B-119 आये, जहाँ रहने वालों का काफी गौरवशाली इतिहास रहा है कटवाने में. फ़िर वही बातें, कला की गहरी समझ और बढ़ती गई. लेकिन, माननी पड़ेगी तुम्हारी निष्कपटता - कई उमा जोली, जिआ लिसा, लिआ: गोटी(पता नहीं कब आएगी ये.. वाच पार्टी रखते हैं) आती-जाती रहेंगी, लेकिन कला की गुणवत्ता और इसका निस्वार्थ प्रचार प्रसार करने का आपका जूनून कम नहीं होगा। 
You were the best DoPA IIT could ever get. #art
"Oye canteen chalega?" Mostly lala maggi ya bhel puri.
"Ye kutton ka kuch kar nahi to maar dunga mai." "Ye lauda sala dog-lover."
"Yahan aurat jaat ka aana mana hai. Aisa koi board laga hall-2 gate pr."
Sale tu taekwando jata tha.. haha. Just keep living it this way - a random life filled with art and passion.
To a physics enthusiast, a true dog-hater, a chef, a passionate man and one of the dearest friends - kabhi trip par chalenge, probably andaman side aur mai projector lete aaunga. Till then,
"Aur be, jaag rha hai?"
author: Shubham  Raj

text:
Aur be dildor.. 
Sale UPSC Aspirant, maggu ho gaya hai tu. Galaxy'20 ka drams chap hi diya tha tumlogon ne. Chuma nukkad, chumma natak. Second year m pehli baar bat hui thi hamari. Lekin, college ki pehli daaru bhi tere sath hi pi hai maine. Tum, mai aur bera.. ME321 m marane k bad. College gate k pas ka momos yad rhega, teri poems yad rhengi (Khalil gibran ki prophet padh li be).. apni 2019 wali Diwali yad rhegi.. 
Bano be IAS, YAss!
Tere uksane pr yearbook banayi hai, dil se likhiyo memoir (Tera bhi kata hai na.. haha.. rhne dete hain ye)
Let love conquer the world!
author: Shubham  Raj

text:
Bsdk tab se mai poonia.. poonia search mar rha hu idhar
Title itna catchy hai to likha bhi kar na. 
B-bot ka sabse chill out insan. Jab nashe krne the to khul k nashe kar liye.. yaari dosti khul k nibha li.. sale lekin mereko tere p fine lagana tha ek baar.. haaye. 
Tere sath baith k shayad kabhi pi nahi.. aage kabhi piunga.. 
Btw.. teri hariyana wali accent fake lagti thi mereko.. koi sabse gaddar cheez thi tere m to teri beard.. katai sexy.. Mat katwaiyo be kabhi (beard bhi).. 
Milte hain phir kabhi!
author: Shubham  Raj

text:
One of the nightmares.. tere sath mess m bhojan krna. 
Theek hai be, agli bar mai hi khoon chus lunga murge ki.. 
Room allocation se khush hai ki nahi? ya hagge m hi room de dun sale baniya.
Keep arguing with people and let them feel you are right and must argue.
Milte hain Bangalore m!
author: Shubham  Raj

text:
Kya li likhu be? Milo lockdown k bad.. Wahin.. Ganga paar.. 40 rupaiya ka chana lek. Paisa waisa to laoge nahi tm.  College ki OAT roof pr pizza khane chalte agar campus jate to. Paise kn deta maloom hi hai, kanjoos sale (tabhi prati nahi pati). 
Khoob anime dekh rhe ho beta aajkl?
author: Shubham  Raj

text:
Aur be sale wing repi.. 
"Aur bhai Phatta league kab krwa rhe ho?"
"Bas galaxy hi krwate ho tmlog, baaki kuch nahi hoga tmse."
Pad gayi thandak, krwa hi phatta league.. chala gaya kasol.. maze lut liye college life k aakhiri dino m..
Sahi hai! 
Matlab, sutta daru na pioge na peene doge. Ye bhi theek hai.
Mangal(Charitraheen sali) k sath RM m kya krte the tm??

text:
Aur be truck driver, lakdi!
Zindagi ka pura nasha chuus k apne andar utar lo aur hall 2 ki sari jhaadiyan pel de. 
Bc tere p fine lagani thi.. lekin ye conspiracy plan nahi kr paye. 
Aise hi maze krte rho.. Phir milenge kisi highway p.
